column2: Borrow 300¤ from the bank of Athens
I can borrow 300¤ from the bank of Athens. I'll owe them 350¤ to be paid back at my convenience.
I will repay the gold that I owe the bank of Athens.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] will move to the court of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]\n
